mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , p.product_price FROM product p LEFT JOIN store_detail s on p.product_id = s.product_id LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id

SELECT p.product_id , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , c.category_name , s.store_detail_price , s.store_detail_quantity , s.is_discount FROM product p LEFT JOIN store_detail s ON p.product_id = s.product_id LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
